title: FPS drops since patch 6.6, running perfectly before the patch.
body:
I think this is only happening with mac users. 

The experience playing league is now really bad and I almost don't even want to play anymore. I don't know what you guys did, but you need to fix whatever you did in patch 6.6 so mac users can play the game smoothly again. This is extremely frustrating. I'm not the only person having this issue.

Edit: 6.7 same issue not fixed

replies.body:
We're currently looking at what may have caused this. From the information we have so far, this seems to be tied to in-game sounds.

While we work on a fix, many players have reported that turning off in-game sound has stopped the fps drops, so I'd recommend trying that as a temporary solution.
Yes I am experiencing crackling sound on my MacBook as well. Maybe that helps in solving the issue? In teamfights I drop to 0-7 fps.
I'd go ahead and try it to see if it helps.  Seems to have worked for most so far.
It still hasn't been fixed at all.
I haven't seen anything either...
Do we have abs update about his?

Is this specific to Mac? I run a state-of-the-art pc on a T1 connection and have been getting lag, disconnects, and rubberbanding since the patch hit.

(Intermittently, not always. Typically it just happens, y'know, at the most important moment in the game)

My friends and I are also experiencing this! Pcs quality ranges are from barely capable of running league to omg do these color actually exsist (high quality) All 7 of us have had problems like the above described since the patch

This issue is specific to Mac, yes.

From the description of what you've been experiencing, my best estimate at the moment is that there's some sporadic packet loss between your network and our servers.  This could be a routing issue, ISP issue, etc.  It's tricky to say without having more specific information.

I'd recommend taking a look at our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article and go through those steps as a first step (particularly the packet loss section).  If you're still having the lag and disconnects, go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a deeper look.
I use a pc and have the same problems as the mac users
I am not using a mac and it still happens (fps drop, laggy sound). I disabled the sound but there is no difference the problem is still there
I've tried this on my macbook (She's an oldie, let's say from 2010?). It works.

I'll try this RiotBok  Thank you for the temp solution.  We understand that the Mac client is an additional issue.  Please handle this in a timely manner.  I understand it is Easter weekend.  Sorry for the timing. -_____-

To all you Windows users reporting you have the "same problem as Mac users" let me take a minute to inform you on what Mac users are actually experiencing to prove that you're having a different issue. 

Audio on macs is totally trashy, meaning the audio files each play 4 or 5 times per sound. As a result, many people find team fights as still images, since so many audio files are playing at once (about 5x the normal amount) fps drops to only a few frames (single digit numbers) and makes the game unplayable. 

The bug is completely tied to audio playing multiple times as disabling all sounds fixes the problem. But I am not about to play ranked without sound. So I go back to leaning the f2p champs in normals until this is fixed. 

This has been a problem in both 6.6 and 6.7. I don't know if Riot changed anything related to rendering audio in 6.6, but whatever was done needs to be fixed. I await your solution Riot. Pls hurry, I enjoy ranked :^)
This isn't in the bug fixes for 6.7?? You guys do realize this is a major issue for all Mac users, correct?

Still got the fps drops... plz Fix it asap 

greetings

same

But I feel like they tried to tone it down. It's not as bad as it was when patch 6.6 was first released. However it's definitely still there.

Hi all ,

i have also all these FPS drops due to sound bugs but i have also graphic bugs which never been fixed ex : Malazhar's Skills , Brand's Skills, Guardian angel, 5th drake buff
Have you those bugs too ? 
Thanks for the attention Riot :)

Haven't had the sound bug all day, but still getting frame drops. Doesn't seem as often as before, but still not playable when it happens. 

Just got the sound bug. Lower frequency to me at least.

Same issue here.  Rumbly broken sound, especially at the lower end.  huge freezing during teamfights.  Before this patch was running 50fps medium with no hiccups.
edit:  using a macbook air 2015
edit2:  I did a repair on my client and this didn't fix the problem-oooo
Data point: I'm on a Mac and have the same issue.

ive been playing lol on the same pc for a year and with the patch 6.7 i have awful fps drops and turning off the sound has not helped
 plz help riot with 6.8 now out it hasnt changed as i go from 60 fps to 3 when i move.

YES! Ever since that patch the audio is terrible and echoing every other game, the frame rate has suddenly gotten so bad I have to put everything on very low now to get stable frames (Before, I ran everything on medium-high at 50-60fps) and even then the frames are slowly drained throughout the course of a game to about 20 at 35 minutes and during teamfights the frames drop down below 10 frames a second. It's terrible! Nothing has been fixed at all!
I use windows 10 and have this problem, please addresses this problem riot
fiiiiiiiix

i also experience huge fps drops since last patch and even the patch before that i literally checked everything and i can't find out what the issue is i'm playing since season 1 and i honestly never had problems. o right i play on windows 10 normal desktop btw the fps drops get worse the longer i play like i start at 300 fps then go to 200 fps when minions etc spawn and 10 minutes later im like 100fps in teamfights i drop down to below 50 and almost unplayable stuttering. its heartbreaking :( help me

The analyzer nor the packet loss bs worked for my computer, nor my friend's. Band-aid solutions and trying to blame it on everyone's isp and computers is getting old. Just fix the max problem and pay more attention to the mac side of things? This is on league's end. Not my ISP. If it was ISP it wouldn't be EVERYONE. Logic here people.
I am using a pc (windows 7) and have the same problems as the mac users (fps drop and laggy sounds) since the patch 6.6. I tried disablind the sound and nothing happens i still get the problems
Yes I been experiencing big time FPS drops on team fights on my Mac. Ever since patch 6.6, I never had this problem. Please fix it as soon as possible.
Maybe tell people its a Mac in the title. :)
